Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.lmax.disruptor.dsl.Disruptor.handleExceptionsWith​(ExceptionHandler<? super T>)
    This method only applies to future event handlers. Use setDefaultExceptionHandler instead which applies to existing and new event handlers.
    com.lmax.disruptor.RingBuffer.isPublished​(long)
    Please don't use this method. It probably won't do what you think that it does.
    com.lmax.disruptor.RingBuffer.resetTo​(long)
    com.lmax.disruptor.util.ThreadHints.onSpinWait()
    Use Thread.onSpinWait() directly. This method previously existed to accomodate Java versions which do not have Thread.onSpinWait().
